messages.content: ComfyUI-RefSampling is a proof-of-concept repo that implements 'Reference CNet' and 'Visual Style Prompting', allowing image generation to adhere to content from reference images and apply style from reference images, respectively.
How does 'Reference CNet' work in ComfyUI-RefSampling?
'Reference CNet' allows image generation that adheres to the content of a reference image by injecting attention from the reference image into the sampled or generated image.
What is 'Visual Style Prompting' used for in ComfyUI-RefSampling?
'Visual Style Prompting' is used for applying style from a reference image to the generated image.
Can ComfyUI-RefSampling generate images from text prompts?
Yes, ComfyUI-RefSampling can generate images from text prompts, and it can also adhere the generated image to content from a reference image.
Can ComfyUI-RefSampling alter the style of an image based on a reference?
Yes, ComfyUI-RefSampling can alter the style of an image based on a reference image using Visual Style Prompting.
What is the role of attention injection in ComfyUI-RefSampling?
Attention injection in ComfyUI-RefSampling is used to transfer aspects from the reference image, such as content or style, to the generated or sampled image.
